# test positive numbers with ADD
00000001 0
00000011 0
00000010 0
00000111 0
00001111 0
01111000 0

# test negative numbers with ADD
10000000 0
11111110 0
11111101 0
11111100 0
11111011 0

# test random numbers with ADD
00000100 0
11111101 0
00000111 0
11111100 0

# test positive numbers with SUB
00000001 1
00000010 1
00000111 1
00000011 1
00001111 1
01111000 1

# test negative numbers with SUB
10000000 1
11111110 1
11111101 1
11111100 1
11111011 1

# test random numbers with SUB
00000100 1
11111101 1
00000111 1
11111100 1
